summary: This mod just adds an extremely overpowered Dwarven Greatsword called The Anextrium Greatsword. Perfect (in my opinion) for playing on legendary difficulty.
descriptionHtml:
--Intro--
Hello everyone, this is my first mod. This mod simply adds an extremely overpowered (depending on the difficulty on which you play) Dwarven Greatsword to the game. The sword is called The Anextrium Greatsword. Perfect (in my opinion) for playing on the legendary difficulty.

--Anextrium--
Anextrium is a type of Dwarven metal that the Dwemer discovered shortly before their whole race disappeared. They noticed it was a lot stronger and lighter than the original dwarven metal. The dwarves disappeared before they could put it into mass production.

--Installation--
1. Download the file
2. Extract the esp into your Skyrim Data folder
(Folder location default: C/Program Files (x86)/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim/Data)
Or use NMM.

--Acquiring The Sword--
Can be made at any forge with the Dwarven Smithing Perk.

--If the mod doesn\'t work for you, check your data files from the Skyrim Launcher and make sure Anextrium Greatsword.esp is ticked. Then press OK.

--Feel free to leave comments and suggestions.
author: Skyrim2302
